;SOUTH AMERICA TOUR PERU Day 1: Arrival in Lima - Cusco - Free Tomorrow - City Tour Archaeological
;Reception at Cusco airport and transfer to hotel, free morning to begin acclimatization to altitude. Go for a walk to main square for lunch, this because Cusco is at 3150 m. and some people may experience altitude sickness (Soroche). At 13h00 you start Archaeological Group City Tour with visit to major tourist attractions of Cusco and the region. Among them, the Cusco Cathedral, Temple of the Sun (Koricancha), Sacsayhuaman Archeological Center, Qenqo Ceremonial Center, Fort Pucapucara and Tambomachay. Return to Cusco and overnight at Hotel.
;
;SOUTH AMERICA TOUR PERU Day 2: Cusco - Sacred Valley of the Incas - Cusco
;At 8:30 am. Group outing to Sacred Valley of the Incas, through which the sacred river Vilcanota. On the way visit the Craft Market Corao, Taray viewpoint, traditional market of Pisac Typical. In the afternoon the Archaeological Complex of Ollantaytambo and Chincheros, the latter with its traditional market and religious buildings. Return to Cusco and Pernot in Hotel.
;
;SOUTH AMERICA TOUR PERU Day 3: Cusco - Machu Picchu - Aguas Calientes - Cusco
;In time transfer to Poroy Station (15 minutes from Cusco), railway station to take the Backpacker train bound for Machu Picchu. Arriving at Aguas Calientes you take a bus to reach Machu Picchu. Guided tour around the citadel and in the afternoon return to Cusco to hours 17.00 pm. At 17.00 pm. Party on the train back to Cusco. Reception at Railway Station and transfer to Hotel.
;
;SOUTH AMERICA TOUR PERU Day 4: Cusco - Free Day - Departure
;In time transfer to Cusco airport to board our flight to Lima and then to their country.
;End of service
